title: エンディング（ノーマル）

text_block_list.text: After racing through the Twinkle Series, things had finally started to settle down a bit... That's when it happened, one day.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: This is the pool, everyone! It's huge, isn't it~!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Wow~!
Matikanetannhauser had been recruited as a guide for the open campus event.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh my. So many young girls, swarming all over.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Heh heh! Once you're in, Turbo's gonna train you all real hard!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser-san, you were on the open campus executive committee, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nuh-uh! It's not that, the chairman asked me to do it! Eheh.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Directly from Chairman Akikawa? That's quite unusual, isn't it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, that's, umm...

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: We really admire Tannhauser-san, and then the chairman said she wanted us to meet her in person and introduced us!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: And that's how we ended up getting a tour from her, too!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Just like we saw on TV, she's so kind and approachable as a senior... we're thrilled!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: She was really cool in the 'Arima Kinen,' and she's our goal!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Heh heh, this is. You're very much adored, aren't you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No, no~, I think you should aim for someone more special than me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: There are lots of girls in this academy who are way more sparkly~ than me, you know.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I bet you'll be surprised once you enroll~!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: No, Tannhauser-san is the best!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: I want to be an Umamusume like Tannhauser-san, approachable and giving courage!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusume C
text_block_list.text: The Chairman also said Matikanetannhauser is a wonderful Umamusume, right!

text_block_list.name: Little Umamusumes
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I see. That's something.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehehe... I'm happy.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, there you are! Chairman!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The tour is over, so I came to report just in case!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Hmm, thanks! They were very pleased too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I got energized too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...So, Chairman. There's something I've been wondering about for a long time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Why do you pay so much attention to me?
I had gotten used to it by now, but... occasionally showing up to encourage me, saying 'I have expectations'—
Yayoi Akikawa had been betting on Matikanetannhauser for some time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I kinda understood you thought my normalcy was good and wanted to give me a push...

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Hmm... Actually, I was worried that going into detail might put pressure on you!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: So I kept quiet—but now that you've grown a bit, I'll tell you! The reason I had expectations for you!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Our school's students are all talented Umamusume! The narrow gate is quite famous!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: But, there's always someone better!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Behind the brilliant victories, there are losers crushed by helplessness! And because of that—

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Many kids come to think of their own talent as 'ordinary'! Eventually, their legs slow, and sometimes their future rots away!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It's not about who's at fault! But as the chairman, it's true that it pained my heart!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: But you! You alone!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Even as you call yourself "ordinary," you don't grow dull. Even when rubbed against geniuses, you only bounce back flexibly!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: That's exactly why I wished for it! I wanted you to become the Umamusume who guides the many Umamusume who brand themselves as "ordinary"...!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: And splendidly, you've made that wish come true!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: At today's open campus, you probably felt it! The presence of the girls chasing after you!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hah, could it be, that's why you went out of your way to...!?

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Yes. But that said, it's not to put pressure on you!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I want you to keep racing freely and ordinarily, just as you have been!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Chairman...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haaaah... I was surprised by how passionate your feelings were, more than I thought.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...But, yeah. Still, it's really nice to have expectations placed on me.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The kids who came to the open campus were also shining so brightly...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I want to do my best. Let's do our best, okay? Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ehehe.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, now that it's decided, training! Speaking of which, last night, I already reworked the plan!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: How about this plan!?
The notebook she held out still had training schedules packed tightly with writing, as usual—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eh, that's not the case! It's ordinary, ordinary!
My days with her, as always, show no signs of ending anytime soon.
